original_text:
But God turned away and gave them over to worship the host of heaven, as it is written in the book of the prophets:
“‘Did you bring to me slain beasts and sacrifices,
    during the forty years in the wilderness, O house of Israel?
korean_text: 하나님이 외면하사 그들을 그 하늘의 군대 섬기는 일에 버려 두셨으니 이는 선지자의 책에 기록된 바 이스라엘의 집이여 너희가 광야에서 사십 년간 희생과 제물을 내게 드린 일이 있었느냐

sentences.original_text: and gave them over to worship the host of heaven
as it is written in the book of the prophets
Did you bring to me slain beasts and sacrifices
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나에게 죽인 짐승과 제물을 가져왔더냐

sentences.original_text: during the forty years in the wilderness
